title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. D, art. 2, pt. 1274 - Vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. D, art. 2, pt. 1274 - Vehicles

State Regulations
§ 1274.1 - Traffic to comply with signals, directives and signs
§ 1274.2 - Operation of vehicles
§ 1274.3 - Operators to be licensed and vehicles registered
§ 1274.4 - Vehicles to be properly equipped
§ 1274.5 - Vehicles to yield right of way to aircraft
§ 1274.6 - Operation of vehicles on landing area restricted
§ 1274.7 - Strict compliance with speed limits required
§ 1274.8 - Loading or unloading passengers by vehicles for hire restricted
§ 1274.9 - Soliciting or searching for passengers by vehicles for hire restricted
§ 1274.10 - Parking restricted
§ 1274.11 - Stopping or parking in certain areas prohibited
§ 1274.12 - Parking in public vehicular parking areas prohibited except upon payment of prescribed fees
§ 1274.13 - Vehicles subject to detention for nonpayment of parking charges
§ 1274.14 - Drivers to report accidents occurring within terminal
§ 1274.15 - Disabled, abandoned and illegally parked vehicles subject to removal

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. D, art. 2, pt. 1274

Statutory authority: N.Y. Laws 1921, ch. 154, art. VI and
N.J. Laws 1921, ch. 151, consented to by Congress 42 U.S. Stat. 174 [1921]; N.Y. Laws 1922, ch. 43 and N.J. Laws 1922, ch. 9, consented to by Congress 42
U.S. Stat. 822 [1922]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
